Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Re: A fatal InitializationException occured 
     when loading job:
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=284768837

>    Ok, now I am presenting Alerts-section of wui. I am getting 2
> alerts. These are showing only warniing. These are..

I personally don't care too much about Heritrix warnings anymore as long
as my crawl crawls :-)

I'm no expert here and don't know what can trigger this specific alert,
but I think I saw it once when I by accident started a new job based on
one with was created before I copied the default profile in place. Or
maybe there was something wrong with the configuration (I can't really
remember precisly).
I think what I did was deleting all previous jobs, restarting Heritrix and
starting over again with one based on the default profile (make sure it
says "default" for "Name of new job" and "Default Profile" for
"Description" when starting with defaults, otherwise there someting
wrong).

HTH,
Max
